item.title: install gnu parallel, not only centos platform
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: ## Steps: visit https://build.opensuse.org/package/show?package=parallel&project=home%3Atange look at right top corner, click download. This support such platforms: Reference: 1. gnu parallel offical 2. 轻松并发执行作业–GNU Parallel
